trans-unit.source: The typical approach is to use the QPlaceManager::compatiblePlace() function, it creates a copy of a place, but only copies data that the manager supports. Manager specific data such as the place identifier is not copied over. The new copy is now suitable for saving into the manager. If the manager supports matching by alternative identifiers, an alternative identifier attribute is assigned to the copy (see Matching places between managers)
trans-unit.target: 典型的方法是使用QPlaceManager :: compatiblePlace（）函数，它创建场所的副本，但仅复制管理器支持的数据。经理特定的数据（例如，地点标识符）不会被复制。现在，新副本适合保存到管理器中。如果管理器支持按备用标识符进行匹配，则将备用标识符属性分配给副本（请参阅管理器之间的匹配位置）

trans-unit.source: The unit of width is the unit of the x-axis. The minimum width for bars is zero, and negative values are treated as zero. Setting the width to zero means that the width of the bar on the screen is one pixel regardless of the scale of the x-axis. Bars wider than zero are scaled using the x-axis scale.
trans-unit.target: 宽度的单位是x轴的单位。条形图的最小宽度为零,负值视为零。将宽度设置为零意味着无论x轴的比例是多少,屏幕上的条形图的宽度都是一个像素。宽于零的条形图将使用X轴的刻度来调整。

trans-unit.source: The units are determined by the underlying paint device. The size is measured in logical pixels when painting to the screen, and in points (1/72 inch) when painting to a printer.
trans-unit.target: 单位由底层的绘画设备决定。在屏幕上绘画时,尺寸以逻辑像素为单位,在打印机上绘画时,尺寸以点(1/72英寸)为单位。

trans-unit.source: The up vector indicates which direction the top of the camera is facing. Think of taking a picture: after positioning yourself and pointing the camera at your target, you might rotate the camera left or right, giving you a portrait or landscape (or angled!) shot. upVector allows you to control this type of movement.

trans-unit.source: The upper limit for the interval value is determined by the number of milliseconds that can be specified in a signed integer (in practice, this is a period of just over 24 days). trans-unit.source: The usage of QModelRoleData::setData(), or similarly QVariant::setValue(), is encouraged over constructing a QVariant separately and using a plain assignment operator; this is because the former allow to re-use the memory already allocated for the QVariant object stored inside a QModelRoleData, while the latter always allocates the new variant and then destroys the old one.
trans-unit.target: 鼓励使用QModelRoleData :: setData（）或类似的QVariant :: setValue（）来代替单独构造QVariant和使用简单赋值运算符。这是因为前者允许重复使用已经为QModelRoleData内部存储的QVariant对象分配的内存，而后者总是分配新变量，然后销毁旧变量。

trans-unit.source: The user can choose a scaling factor from the control panel or via context menu. This works by making the functions for querying the system metrics return different values for standard font sizes, sizes of window borders, and so on. It does not perform any actual scaling.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以从控制面板或通过上下文菜单选择一个缩放因子。它的工作原理是使查询系统指标的函数为标准字体大小、窗口边框大小等返回不同的值。它不进行任何实际的缩放。

trans-unit.source: The user can cycle through three separate states. This value was added in Qt 5.5.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以在三个独立的状态中循环。这个值是在Qt 5.5中增加的。

trans-unit.source: The user can drop one dock widget "on top" of another. The two widgets are stacked and a tab bar appears for selecting which one is visible.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以将一个停靠部件 "放在 "另一个部件上。两个小组件堆叠在一起,并出现一个标签栏,用于选择哪个小组件可见。

trans-unit.source: The user can hide the splash screen by clicking on it with the mouse. Since the splash screen is typically displayed before the event loop has started running, it is necessary to periodically call QApplication::processEvents() to receive the mouse clicks.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以通过使用鼠标单击来隐藏启动画面。由于启动屏幕通常在事件循环开始运行之前显示，因此有必要定期调用QApplication :: processEvents（）来接收鼠标单击。

trans-unit.source: The user can hide the splash screen by clicking on it with the mouse. Since the splash screen is typically displayed before the event loop has started running, it is necessary to periodically call QCoreApplication::processEvents() to receive the mouse clicks.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以通过使用鼠标单击来隐藏启动画面。由于启动屏幕通常在事件循环开始运行之前显示，因此有必要定期调用QCoreApplication :: processEvents（）来接收鼠标单击。

trans-unit.source: The user can interact with the item.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以与项目进行互动。

trans-unit.source: The user can only open the menu within the inner rectangle. In this case, they've opened the menu on the edge of the MouseArea, but there would not be enough room to display the entire menu centered at the cursor position, so it was moved to the left.
trans-unit.target: 用户只能在内部矩形内打开菜单。在这种情况下，他们已经打开了MouseArea边缘上的菜单，但是没有足够的空间来显示整个菜单（以光标位置为中心），因此将其向左移动。

trans-unit.source: The user can resize the section. The section can also be resized programmatically using resizeSection(). The section size defaults to defaultSectionSize. (See also cascadingSectionResizes.)
trans-unit.target: 用户可以调整部分的大小。也可以使用resizeSection（）以编程方式调整该部分的大小。段大小默认为defaultSectionSize。（另请参见cascadingSectionResizes。）

trans-unit.source: The user can store customCount() different custom colors. The custom colors are shared by all color dialogs, and remembered during the execution of the program. Use setCustomColor() to set the custom colors, and use customColor() to get them.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以存储customCount（）不同的自定义颜色。自定义颜色由所有颜色对话框共享，并在程序执行期间被记住。使用setCustomColor（）设置自定义颜色，并使用customColor（）来获取它们。

trans-unit.source: The user canceled the download.
trans-unit.target: 用户取消了下载。

trans-unit.source: The user cannot resize the section. The section can only be resized programmatically using resizeSection(). The section size defaults to defaultSectionSize.
trans-unit.target: 用户无法调整该部分的大小。只能使用resizeSection（）以编程方式调整该部分的大小。段大小默认为defaultSectionSize。

trans-unit.source: The user changed his widget sizes (macOS only).
trans-unit.target: 用户更改了他的小部件尺寸（仅适用于macOS）。

trans-unit.source: The user changed his widget sizes (macOS only).
trans-unit.target: 用户改变了他的widget大小(仅限macOS)。

trans-unit.source: The user clicks a widget.
trans-unit.target: 用户点击一个小部件。

trans-unit.source: The user enters some information such as the starting point of the route, some waypoints and the destination. All of these locations are waypoints so the locations from start to finish will be entered as a sequence of waypoints. Then other query properties can be set that may be specific to this trip.
trans-unit.target: 用户输入一些信息,如路线的起点、一些航点和目的地。所有这些地点都是航点,所以从起点到终点的地点将以航点序列的形式输入。然后还可以设置其他的查询属性,这些属性可能是这次旅行的特定属性。

trans-unit.source: The user guarantees that the string components are valid for a QName. In particular, the local name, and the prefix (if present), must be valid NCNames. The function isNCName() can be used to test validity of these names. The namespace URI should be an absolute URI. QUrl::isRelative() can be used to test whether the namespace URI is relative or absolute. Finally, providing a prefix is not valid when no namespace URI is provided.
trans-unit.target: 用户保证字符串组件对于QName有效。特别是，本地名称和前缀（如果存在）必须是有效的NCNames。函数isNCName（）可用于测试这些名称的有效性。名称空间URI应该是绝对URI。QUrl :: isRelative（）可用于测试名称空间URI是相对的还是绝对的。最后，如果未提供名称空间URI，则提供前缀无效。

trans-unit.source: The user has denied permission.
trans-unit.target: 用户已经拒绝了权限。

trans-unit.source: The user has granted permission.
trans-unit.target: 该用户已授予权限。

trans-unit.source: The user has to be aware that
trans-unit.target: 用户必须知道

trans-unit.source: The user info and host are separated by a '@', and the host and port are separated by a ':'. If the user info is empty, the '@' must be omitted; although a stray ':' is permitted if the port is empty.
trans-unit.target: 用户信息和主机用'@'隔开,主机和端口用':'隔开。如果用户信息为空,则'@'必须省略;但如果端口为空,则允许使用':'来分隔。

trans-unit.source: The user info consists of a user name and optionally a password, separated by a ':'. If the password is empty, the colon must be omitted. The following example shows a valid user info string:
trans-unit.target: 用户信息由用户名和可选的密码组成,用':'分隔。如果密码为空,则必须省略冒号。下面的例子显示了一个有效的用户信息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The user info, path and fragment are all converted to UTF-8, and all non-ASCII characters are then percent encoded. The host name is encoded using Punycode.
trans-unit.target: 用户信息、路径和片段都被转换为UTF-8,所有非ASCII字符都会进行百分比编码。主机名使用Punycode编码。

trans-unit.source: The user input resolution options define how fromUserInput() should interpret strings that could either be a relative path or the short form of a HTTP URL. For instance file.pl can be either a local file or the URL http://file.pl.
trans-unit.target: 用户输入解析选项定义了fromUserInput（）如何解释可能是相对路径或HTTP URL缩写形式的字符串。例如， file.pl 可以是本地文件，也可以是URL http://file.pl 。

trans-unit.source: The user interface, which provides controls for handwriting mode and the visibility of the keyboard, is application-specific. One suggested implementation is to use a floating button on the handwriting panel, where single click toggles the handwriting mode (changes the active property), and double-click toggles the visibility of the keyboard (changes the available property).
trans-unit.target: 用户界面是特定于应用程序的，它提供了手写模式和键盘可见性的控件。一种建议的实现方式是使用手写面板上的浮动按钮，其中单击可切换手写模式（更改活动属性），而双击可切换键盘的可见性（更改可用属性）。

trans-unit.target: 用户将焦点移动到一个窗口,应用程序必须确定窗口中的哪个部件应该得到焦点。

trans-unit.source: The user must click the OK button to dismiss the message box. The rest of the GUI is blocked until the message box is dismissed.

trans-unit.target: 用户选择由selectItem（）方法处理。当用户从列表中选择一个项目时，视图应调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The user should inherit this class and specify it's own properties, which can then be used from QML code. The user then should use these properties to construct the geometry and set it for the QQuick3DGeometry, which then uploads it to the Qt Quick3D engine.
trans-unit.target: 用户应该继承这个类并指定它自己的属性,然后可以从QML代码中使用这些属性。然后,用户应该使用这些属性来构造几何体,并为QQuick3DGeometry设置,然后上传至Qt Quick3D引擎。

trans-unit.source: The user typed a label's buddy shortcut
trans-unit.target: 用户输入了一个标签的好友快捷键。

trans-unit.source: The user will then be able to choose a scale from 1% to 1000% or select "Auto" to leave it up to the application to choose. Your code must then interpret the spin box value of 0 as a request from the user to scale the image to fit inside the window.
trans-unit.target: 然后,用户可以选择1%到1000%的比例,或者选择 "自动",让应用程序自行选择。然后,你的代码必须将自旋盒的值0解释为用户要求缩放图像以适应窗口内的要求。

trans-unit.source: The user's desktop directory.
trans-unit.target: 用户的桌面目录。

trans-unit.source: The user's desktop settings control whether certain executable file types are opened for browsing, or if they are executed instead. Some desktop environments are configured to prevent users from executing files obtained from non-local URLs, or to ask the user's permission before doing so.
trans-unit.target: 用户的桌面设置可以控制是否打开某些可执行文件类型进行浏览,或者是否代替它们被执行。一些桌面环境被配置为防止用户执行从非本地URL获得的文件,或在执行前询问用户的许可。

trans-unit.source: The usual approach when one reimplements QStyle virtual functions is to do work on elements that are different from the super class; for all other elements, you can simply use the super class implementation.
trans-unit.target: 重新实现QStyle虚拟函数的通常方法是对不同于超类的元素进行处理。对于所有其他元素，您可以简单地使用超类实现。

trans-unit.source: The usual behavior is to transfer focus only when an item is clicked. Often a tap on a touchpad is interpreted as equivalent to a mouse click by the operating system, generating a synthesized click event in response. However, at least on macOS you can configure this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 通常的行为是仅在单击项目时转移焦点。通常，操作系统将触摸板上的轻击解释为等效于鼠标单击，从而在响应中生成综合的单击事件。但是，至少可以在macOS上配置此行为。

trans-unit.source: The usual behavior is to transfer focus only when an item is clicked. Often a tap on a touchpad is interpreted as equivalent to a mouse click by the operating system, generating a synthesized click event in response. However, at least on macOS you can configure this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 通常的行为是只在点击某个项目时才转移焦点。通常,触摸板上的点击被操作系统解释为等同于鼠标点击,生成一个合成的点击事件作为回应。然而,至少在 macOS 上,您可以配置这种行为。

trans-unit.source: The usual pattern is to use a gadget class as the type of a property, or to emit a gadget as a signal argument. In such cases, the gadget instance is passed by value between C++ and QML (because it's a value type). If QML code changes a property of a gadget property, the entire gadget is re-created and passed back to the C++ property setter. In Qt 5, gadget types cannot be instantiated by direct declaration in QML. In contrast, a QObject instance can be declared; and QObject instances are always passed by pointer from C++ to QML.
trans-unit.target: 通常的模式是使用小工具类作为属性的类型，或发出小工具作为信号参数。在这种情况下，小工具实例在C ++和QML之间通过值传递（因为它是一种值类型）。如果QML代码更改了小工具属性的属性，则将重新创建整个小工具并将其传递回C ++属性设置器。在Qt 5中，无法通过在QML中直接声明来实例化小工具类型。相反，可以声明一个QObject实例。和QObject实例总是通过指针从C ++传递到QML。

trans-unit.source: The utilities need to be in a standard location, such as /bin or /usr/bin. Alternatively, you can use the ~/.ssh/environment file to set variables for remote commands, such as PATH. In addition, you must set enable PermitUserEnvironment in the SSH Daemon configuration.
trans-unit.target: 实用程序必须位于标准位置，例如 /bin 或 /usr/bin 。另外，您可以使用 ~/.ssh/environment 文件来设置远程命令的变量，例如 PATH 。另外，必须在SSH守护程序配置中设置 enable PermitUserEnvironment 。

trans-unit.source: The valid progress value is 0.0 to 1.0, setting values less than 0 will be converted to 0, setting values great than 1 will be converted to 1.
trans-unit.target: 有效 progress 值为0.0到1.0，小于0的设置值将转换为0，大于1的设置值将转换为1。

trans-unit.source: The valid keys can be retrieved using the keys() function. Typically they include "windows" and "fusion". Depending on the platform, "windowsvista" and "macintosh" may be available. Note that keys are case insensitive.

trans-unit.source: The valid values range depends on the parameter type. For WhiteBalancePreset the value should be one of QCameraImageProcessing::WhiteBalanceMode values; for Contrast, Saturation, Brightness, Sharpening and Denoising the value should be in [0..1.0] range with invalid QVariant value indicating the default parameter value; for ContrastAdjustment, SaturationAdjustment, BrightnessAdjustment, SharpeningAdjustment and DenoisingAdjustment the value should be in [-1.0..1.0] range with default 0.
trans-unit.target: 有效值范围取决于参数类型。对于WhiteBalancePreset，该值应为QCameraImageProcessing :: WhiteBalanceMode值之一；对于“对比度”，“饱和度”，“亮度”，“锐化”和“降噪”，该值应在[0..1.0]范围内，其中无效的QVariant值指示默认参数值；对于ContrastAdjustment，SaturationAdjustment，BrightnessAdjustment，SharpeningAdjustment和DenoisingAdjustment的值应该是在[-1.0..1.0]范围内具有默认0。

trans-unit.source: The validity of a QTextFrameFormat object can be determined with the isValid() function.

trans-unit.source: The values above may seem a bit strange, but there is a guiding principle. It advances by doubling the size each time. More precisely, it advances to the next power of two, minus 16 bytes. 16 bytes corresponds to eight characters, as QString uses UTF-16 internally.
trans-unit.target: 上面的值可能看起来有些奇怪，但是有一个指导原则。每次将大小增加一倍就可以前进。更准确地说，它前进到2的下一个幂，减去16个字节。16个字节对应8个字符，因为QString在内部使用UTF-16。

trans-unit.source: The values of EncodeReserved and DecodeReserved should not be used together in one call. The behavior is undefined if that happens. trans-unit.source: The values of a record's fields can be set by name or position with setValue(); if you want to set a field to null use setNull(). To find the position of a field by name use indexOf(), and to find the name of a field at a particular position use fieldName(). Use field() to retrieve a QSqlField object for a given field. Use contains() to see if the record contains a particular field name.
trans-unit.target: 记录字段的值可以使用setValue（）通过名称或位置进行设置；如果要将字段设置为null，请使用setNull（）。若要按名称查找字段的位置，请使用indexOf（），并在特定位置查找字段的名称，请使用fieldName（）。使用field（）检索给定字段的QSqlField对象。使用contains（）查看记录是否包含特定的字段名称。

trans-unit.source: The values of characteristics and descriptors can be retrieved via QLowEnergyCharacteristic and QLowEnergyDescriptor, respectively. However, direct reading or writing of these attributes requires the service object. The readCharacteristic() function attempts to re-read the value of a characteristic. Although the initial service discovery may have obtained a value already this call may be required in cases where the characteristic value constantly changes without any notifications being provided. An example might be a time characteristic that provides a continuous value. If the read attempt is successful, the characteristicRead() signal is emitted. A failure to read the value triggers the CharacteristicReadError. The writeCharacteristic() function attempts to write a new value to the given characteristic. If the write attempt is successful, the characteristicWritten() signal is emitted. A failure to write triggers the CharacteristicWriteError. Reading and writing of descriptors follows the same pattern.
trans-unit.target: 可以分别通过QLowEnergyCharacteristic和QLowEnergyDescriptor检索特征和描述符的值。但是，直接读取或写入这些属性需要服务对象。所述readCharacteristic（）函数尝试重新读取一个特性的值。尽管初始服务发现可能已经获得了一个值，但在特征值不断变化而没有提供任何通知的情况下，可能需要此调用。一个示例可能是提供连续值的时间特性。如果读的尝试是成功的，characteristicRead（）信号被发射。读取值失败会触发CharacteristicReadError。所述writeCharacteristic（）函数尝试写入新的值，以给定特征。如果写尝试是成功的，characteristicWritten（）信号被发射。写入失败会触发CharacteristicWriteError。描述符的读取和写入遵循相同的模式。

trans-unit.source: The various enums and types for page sizes, margins, and orientation have been consolidated. trans-unit.source: The version of qmake supplied in source packages is configured slightly differently to that supplied in binary packages in that it uses a different feature specification. Where the source package typically uses the macx-g++ specification, the binary package is typically configured to use the macx-xcode specification.
trans-unit.target: 源软件包中提供的qmake的版本与二进制软件包中提供的qmake的配置略有不同，因为它使用了不同的功能规范。在源程序包通常使用 macx-g++ 规范的情况下，二进制程序包通常配置为使用 macx-xcode 规范。

trans-unit.target: 类的版本(默认为1.0)

trans-unit.target: 接受点和矩形的版本是从Qt 5.15开始的。

trans-unit.source: The vertex attributes provided as inputs to the vertex shaders are defined by the mesh files. The following vertex attributes are used by default.
trans-unit.target: 作为顶点着色器输入的顶点属性由网格文件定义。默认使用以下顶点属性。

trans-unit.source: The vertex color material respects both current opacity and current matrix when updating it's rendering state.
trans-unit.target: 顶点颜色材质在更新其渲染状态时,会同时尊重当前的不透明度和当前的矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The vertex color material will give each vertex in a geometry a color. Pixels between vertices will be linearly interpolated. The colors can contain transparency.
trans-unit.target: 顶点颜色材料将为几何体中的每个顶点赋予一种颜色。顶点之间的像素将被线性插值。颜色可以包含透明度。

trans-unit.source: The vertex normal from the input mesh data, or all zeroes if there were no normals provided. As with VERTEX, the shader is free to alter the value as it sees fit. The altered value is then used by the rest of the pipeline, including the lighting calculations in the fragment stage.
trans-unit.target: 输入网格数据中的顶点法线,如果没有提供法线,则全部为零。与VERTEX一样,着色器可以根据自己的需要自由改变该值。修改后的值会被管道的其他部分使用,包括片段阶段的光照计算。

trans-unit.source: The vertex position the shader receives as input. A common use case for vertex shaders in custom materials is to change (displace) the x, y, or z values of this vector, by simply assigning a value to the whole vector, or some of its components.
trans-unit.target: 着色器接收到的顶点位置作为输入。顶点着色器在自定义材质中的一个常见用例是改变(位移)该向量的x、y或z值,只需为整个向量或其部分组件赋值即可。

trans-unit.source: The vertex shader in an unshaded material still has the typical inputs available: VERTEX, NORMAL, MODELVIEWPROJECTION_MATRIX, etc. and can write to POSITION. The fragment shader no longer has the similar conveniences available, however: NORMAL, UV0, or VAR_WORLD_POSITION are not available in an unshaded material's fragment shader. Rather, it is now up to the shader code to calculate and pass on using VARYING everything it needs to determine the final fragment color.
trans-unit.target: 未着色材质中的顶点着色器仍具有可用的典型输入： VERTEX ， NORMAL ， MODELVIEWPROJECTION_MATRIX 等，并且可以写入 POSITION 。片段着色器不再具有类似的可用便利，但是：未着色材质的片段着色器中不提供 NORMAL ， UV0 或 VAR_WORLD_POSITION 。相反，现在由着色器代码来计算并使用 VARYING 传递确定最终片段颜色所需的一切。

trans-unit.source: The vertical direction. Equivalent to GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T
trans-unit.target: 垂直方向。相当于GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T。

trans-unit.source: The vertical extra space on the top/bottom of a menu.
trans-unit.target: 菜单顶部/底部的垂直额外空间。

trans-unit.source: The vertical flags are:
trans-unit.target: 竖旗是:

trans-unit.source: The vertical movement x position is cleared automatically when the cursor moves horizontally, and kept unchanged when the cursor moves vertically. The mechanism allows the cursor to move up and down on a visually straight line with proportional fonts, and to gently "jump" over short lines.
trans-unit.target: 当光标水平移动时,垂直移动x位置会自动清除,当光标垂直移动时保持不变。该机制可以使光标在视觉直线上按比例字体上下移动,并在短线上轻轻 "跳跃"。

trans-unit.source: The vertical position of the PathText's baseline.
trans-unit.target: PathText基线的垂直位置。

trans-unit.source: The vertical position of the pie.
trans-unit.target: 饼的垂直位置。

trans-unit.target: 设备的垂直分辨率，以每英寸点数为单位。另请参见logicalDpiY（）。

trans-unit.source: The vertical resolution of the device in dots per inch. See also physicalDpiY().
trans-unit.target: 设备的垂直分辨率，以每英寸点数为单位。另请参见physicalDpiY（）。

trans-unit.source: The vertical roughness texture map. Default is a Texture with source "maps/brushed_full_contrast.png".
trans-unit.target: 垂直粗糙度纹理贴图。默认是一个带有源 "maps/brushed_full_contrast.png" 的纹理。

trans-unit.source: The vertical speed, in meters/sec.
trans-unit.target: 垂直速度,米/秒。

trans-unit.source: The video pixel data in a QVideoFrame is encapsulated in a QAbstractVideoBuffer. A QVideoFrame may be constructed from any buffer type by subclassing the QAbstractVideoBuffer class.
trans-unit.target: QVideoFrame中的视频像素数据封装在QAbstractVideoBuffer中。甲QVideoFrame可以由任何类型的缓冲器通过继承来构造QAbstractVideoBuffer类。

trans-unit.target: QVideoFrame中的视频像素数据封装在QAbstractVideoBuffer中。通过子类化QAbstractVideoBuffer类，可以从任何缓冲区类型构造QVideoFrame 。

trans-unit.source: The video player is available to use.
trans-unit.target: 视频播放器是可以使用的。

trans-unit.source: The view
trans-unit.target: 观点

trans-unit.source: The view accepts drops
trans-unit.target: 该视图接受滴

trans-unit.source: The view accepts move (not copy) operations only from itself.
trans-unit.target: 该视图仅从自身接受移动（而不是复制）操作。

trans-unit.source: The view classes that inherit QAbstractItemView only need to implement their own view-specific functionality, such as drawing items, returning the geometry of items, finding items, etc.
trans-unit.target: 继承QAbstractItemView的视图类仅需要实现自己的特定于视图的功能，例如绘图项目，返回项目的几何形状，查找项目等。

trans-unit.source: The view classes that inherit QAbstractItemView only need to implement their own view-specific functionality, such as drawing items, returning the geometry of items, finding items, etc.
trans-unit.target: 继承QAbstractItemView的视图类只需要实现自己的视图专用功能,如绘制物品、返回物品的几何形状、查找物品等。

trans-unit.source: The view currently hosting the developer tools for this view. Setting it to a new view will navigate that view to an internal URL with the developer tools, and bind it to this view.
trans-unit.target: 当前托管该视图的开发工具的视图。将其设置为新视图,将使该视图导航到带有开发工具的内部 URL,并将其绑定到此视图。

trans-unit.source: The view does not take ownership of
trans-unit.target: 观点不占主导地位

trans-unit.source: The view ensures that the editor's data and geometry are set correctly by calling functions that we define later for these purposes. We can create different editors depending on the model index supplied by the view. For example, if we have a column of integers and a column of strings we could return either a QSpinBox or a QLineEdit, depending on which column is being edited.
trans-unit.target: 该视图可通过调用稍后为这些目的定义的函数来确保正确设置编辑器的数据和几何形状。我们可以根据视图提供的模型索引创建不同的编辑器。例如，如果我们有一列整数和一列字符串，则可以返回 QSpinBox 或 QLineEdit ，具体取决于正在编辑的列。

trans-unit.source: The view has a model, which defines the data to be displayed, and a delegate, which defines how the data should be displayed. The delegate is instantiated for each item on the path. The items may be flicked to move them along the path.
trans-unit.target: 该视图具有一个模型和一个委托，该模型定义了要显示的数据，该委托定义了如何显示数据。该委托被实例化的每个项目的路径。物品可能会轻弹以沿路径移动。

trans-unit.source: The view is first created
trans-unit.target: 视图首先被创建

trans-unit.source: The view is shown in the normal way:
trans-unit.target: 视图以正常方式显示。

trans-unit.source: The view itself does not provide sorting. This has to be done on the model itself. However you can provide sorting on the model, and enable sort indicators on headers.
trans-unit.target: 视图本身不提供排序。这必须在模型本身上完成。但是您可以在模型上提供排序,并在标题上启用排序指示器。

trans-unit.source: The view obtains
trans-unit.target: 观点获得

trans-unit.source: The view receives input events from the keyboard and mouse, and translates these to scene events (converting the coordinates used to scene coordinates where appropriate), before sending the events to the visualized scene.
trans-unit.target: 视图接收来自键盘和鼠标的输入事件,并将这些事件转换为场景事件(在适当的地方将使用的坐标转换为场景坐标),然后将事件发送到可视化场景。

trans-unit.source: The view renders the contents of a model, accessing data via the model's interface. When the user tries to edit an item, the view uses a default delegate to provide an editor widget.
trans-unit.target: 视图渲染模型的内容,通过模型的界面访问数据。当用户试图编辑一个项目时,视图使用一个默认的委托来提供一个编辑器部件。

trans-unit.source: The view resizes with the root item in the QML.
trans-unit.target: 视图随QML中的根项调整大小。

trans-unit.source: The view should use the delegate to open an editor on the next item in the view.
trans-unit.target: 视图应该使用委托来打开视图中下一个项目的编辑器。

trans-unit.source: The view should use the delegate to open an editor on the previous item in the view.
trans-unit.target: 视图应该使用委托来打开视图中上一个项目的编辑器。

trans-unit.source: The view supports both dragging and dropping
trans-unit.target: 该视图支持拖放

trans-unit.source: The view supports dragging of its own items
trans-unit.target: 视图支持拖动自己的项目

trans-unit.source: The view takes ownership over the given
trans-unit.target: 视图对给定的

trans-unit.source: The view this view is currently inspecting, if any. Setting it will navigate to an internal URL with the developer tools of the view set.
trans-unit.target: 此视图当前正在检查的视图,如果有的话。设置它将导航到一个内部的URL与视图集的开发者工具。

trans-unit.source: The view will automatically resize the root item to the size of the view.
trans-unit.target: 视图会自动调整根项的大小,使其符合视图的大小。

trans-unit.source: The view will create a new delegate for each item in the model. Note that the delegate is able to access the model's name and portrait data directly.

trans-unit.source: The view's root index can be used to control how much of a hierarchical model is displayed. QFileSystemModel provides a convenience function that returns a suitable model index for a path to a directory within the model.

trans-unit.source: The viewport determines the current "window" on the contentItem. In other words, it clips it and the size of the viewport tells you how much of the content area is visible.
trans-unit.target: 视口确定contentItem上的当前“窗口” 。换句话说，它会对其进行裁剪，并且视口的大小会告诉您可见的内容区域有多少。

trans-unit.source: The viewport in which this event originated. A null value means the event originated from a frame graph branch without a QViewport. If a frame graph branch has a Viewport inside a Viewport the property will contain the leaf viewport.
trans-unit.target: 引发此事件的视口。null值表示事件源自没有QViewport的框架图分支。如果框架图分支的视口中有一个视口，则该属性将包含叶视口。

trans-unit.source: The viewport in which this event originated. A null value means the event originated from a frame graph branch without a Viewport. If a frame graph branch has a Viewport inside a Viewport the property will contain the leaf viewport.
trans-unit.target: 事件发生的视口。空值表示该事件源于没有Viewport的框架图分支。如果一个帧图分支在一个视口内有一个视口,该属性将包含叶视口。

trans-unit.source: The viewport is the region of a video frame that is actually displayed.
trans-unit.target: 视口是实际显示的视频帧的区域。

trans-unit.source: The viewport rectangle is part of the view transformation. The viewport specifies the device coordinate system. Its sister, the window(), specifies the logical coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: 视口矩形是视图转换的一部分。视口指定设备坐标系。它的姐妹窗口（）指定逻辑坐标系。

trans-unit.source: The viewport, "window" and transformation matrix determine how logical QPainter coordinates map to the paint device's physical coordinates. By default the world transformation matrix is the identity matrix, and the "window" and viewport settings are equivalent to the paint device's settings, i.e. the world, "window" and device coordinate systems are equivalent, but as we have seen, the systems can be manipulated using transformation operations and window-viewport conversion. The illustration above describes the process.
trans-unit.target: 视口，“窗口”和转换矩阵确定逻辑QPainter坐标如何映射到绘画设备的物理坐标。默认情况下，世界转换矩阵是恒等矩阵，并且“窗口”和视口设置等同于绘画设备的设置，即世界，“窗口”和设备坐标系是等效的，但是正如我们所看到的，系统可以使用转换操作和窗口-视口转换进行操纵。上图说明了该过程。

trans-unit.source: The views are constructed in the same way as other widgets. Setting up a view to display the items in the model is simply a matter of calling its setModel() function with the directory model as the argument. We filter the data supplied by the model by calling the setRootIndex() function on each view, passing a suitable
trans-unit.target: 视图的构造方式与其他小部件相同。设置视图以显示模型中的项目仅需使用目录模型作为参数来调用其setModel（）函数即可。我们通过在每个视图上调用setRootIndex（）函数来过滤模型提供的数据，并传递适当的

trans-unit.source: The views handle dragging and flicking of their content, however they do not handle touch interaction with the individual delegates. In order for the delegates to react to touch input, e.g. to set the currentIndex, a MouseArea with the appropriate touch handling logic must be provided by the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 视图处理其内容的拖动和轻拂，但是不处理与各个代表的触摸交互。为了使委托人对触摸输入做出反应，例如设置 currentIndex ，委托人必须提供具有适当触摸处理逻辑的MouseArea。

trans-unit.source: The virtual timerEvent() function is called with the QTimerEvent event parameter class when a timer event occurs. Reimplement this function to get timer events.
trans-unit.target: 发生计时器事件时，将使用QTimerEvent事件参数类调用虚拟timerEvent（）函数。重新实现此功能以获取计时器事件。

trans-unit.source: The virtual isSubtreeBlocked() function can be used to disable a subtree all together. Nodes in a blocked subtree will not be preprocessed() and not rendered.
trans-unit.target: 虚拟isSubtreeBlocked（）函数可用于一起禁用子树。阻塞的子树中的节点将不会进行preprocessed（）且不会呈现。

trans-unit.source: The virtual QWidget::enterEvent() handler now receives a QEnterEvent* parameter which has information about the pointer position, rather than a plain QEvent*.
trans-unit.target: 虚拟的QWidget :: enterEvent（）处理函数现在将接收一个QEnterEvent *参数，该参数具有有关指针位置的信息，而不是普通的QEvent *。

trans-unit.source: The virtual folder tag is mandatory and the folder name must not contain any slashes (/).
trans-unit.target: 虚拟文件夹标签是强制性的,文件夹名称不得包含任何斜线(/)。

trans-unit.source: The virtual function is called before each invocation of paintGL().
trans-unit.target: 在每次调用paintGL（）之前，将调用虚拟函数。

trans-unit.source: The virtual keyboard layouts system supports built-in layouts as well as custom layouts. The built-in layouts are embedded as Qt Resources into the plugin binary. Custom layouts are located in the file system, so that they can be installed without recompiling the virtual keyboard itself, or they can be located in a resource file.
trans-unit.target: 虚拟键盘布局系统支持内置布局以及自定义布局。内置布局作为Qt资源嵌入到插件二进制文件中。自定义布局位于文件系统中，因此可以在不重新编译虚拟键盘本身的情况下安装它们，也可以将它们放在资源文件中。

trans-unit.source: The virtual keyboard searches for the keyboard layouts (per language) from a specific path
trans-unit.target: 虚拟键盘从特定路径搜索键盘布局(按语言)。

trans-unit.source: The virtual keyboard styling system supports built-in styles as well as custom styles. The built-in styles are embedded as Qt Resources into the plugin binary and the custom styles are located in the file system and can be installed without recompiling the virtual keyboard itself.
trans-unit.target: 虚拟键盘样式系统支持内置样式和自定义样式。内置样式作为Qt资源嵌入到插件二进制中,而自定义样式位于文件系统中,无需重新编译虚拟键盘本身即可安装。

trans-unit.source: The virtual loopback interface, which is assigned the loopback IP addresses (127.0.0.1, ::1).
trans-unit.target: 虚拟环回接口,该接口被分配了环回IP地址(127.0.0.1,::1)。

trans-unit.source: The virtual siblings are the screen instances sharing the same virtual desktop. They share a common coordinate system, and windows can freely be moved or positioned across them without having to be re-created.

trans-unit.source: The virtualkeyboard module must be linked against the plugin:

trans-unit.source: The way Qt handles this platform difference is by letting widgets move the keyboard focus when the wheel is used. With the right focus policy on each widget, applications can work idiomatically correctly on Windows, macOS, and X11.
trans-unit.target: Qt处理此平台差异的方式是通过使小部件在使用滚轮时移动键盘焦点。通过对每个小部件使用正确的焦点策略，应用程序可以在Windows，macOS和X11 上正常地正常工作。

trans-unit.source: The way Qt handles this platform difference is by letting widgets move the keyboard focus when the wheel is used. With the right focus policy on each widget, applications can work idiomatically correctly on Windows, macOS, and X11.
trans-unit.target: Qt处理这种平台差异的方式是让widget在使用滚轮时移动键盘焦点。在每个部件上使用正确的焦点策略,应用程序可以在Windows、macOS和X11上正确地习惯性地工作。

trans-unit.source: The way items are selected is controlled by the widget's selection mode (QAbstractItemView::SelectionMode). This property controls whether the user can select one or many items and, in many-item selections, whether the selection must be a continuous range of items. The selection mode works in the same way for all of the above widgets.
trans-unit.target: 选择项目的方式由小部件的选择模式（QAbstractItemView :: SelectionMode）控制。此属性控制用户是否可以选择一个或多个项目，并且在多个项目选择中控制选择是否必须是连续范围的项目。对于所有上述小部件，选择模式都以相同的方式工作。

trans-unit.source: The way that any given model handles dropped data depends on both its type (list, table, or tree) and the way its contents is likely to be presented to the user. Generally, the approach taken to accommodate dropped data should be the one that most suits the model's underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: 任何给定模型处理掉落数据的方式都取决于它的类型(列表、表或树)和它的内容可能呈现给用户的方式。一般来说,处理掉落数据的方法应该是最适合模型的基础数据存储的方法。

trans-unit.source: The web channel instance used by this view. trans-unit.source: The white colored PointLight here is moved on the Z axis so that it is halfway between the camera and the center of the scene. Unlike DirectionalLight, the rotation of the PointLight does not matter, whereas its position is significant. The diminishing intensity is visible here, especially on the rectangle mesh in the background.
trans-unit.target: 这里白色的PointLight在Z轴上移动，因此它位于相机和场景中心之间的中间位置。与DirectionalLight不同，PointLight的旋转无关紧要，而其位置很重要。在此可见强度的降低，尤其是在背景中的矩形网格上。

trans-unit.target: 图像的白点。通常没有必要对此进行调整。范围是 [0...1] 。默认为 1 。

trans-unit.source: The whitespace mode used to display normal word wrapped text in paragraphs.
trans-unit.target: 用于在段落中显示正常的包字文本的空白模式。

trans-unit.source: The whole application is contained within the main() function:
trans-unit.target: 整个应用程序包含在 main() 函数中：

trans-unit.source: The whole connection can be selected by clicking on any of its path segments. Once selected, a connection can be deleted with the Delete key, ensuring that it will not be set up in the UI file.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过单击任何路径段来选择整个连接。选择后，可以使用Delete键删除连接，以确保不会在UI文件中建立连接。

trans-unit.source: The whole second, with a leading zero where applicable (00 to 59)
trans-unit.target: 整数秒,在适用的情况下,前导为零(00至59)。

trans-unit.target: 整数秒,不含任何前导零(0~59)。

trans-unit.source: The widest tickmark will determine the space set aside for all tickmarks. For this reason, the implicitWidth of each tickmark should be greater than or equal to that of each minor tickmark. If you need minor tickmarks to have greater widths than the major tickmarks, set the larger width in a child item of the minorTickmark component.
trans-unit.target: 最宽的刻度线将确定为所有刻度线留出的空间。出于这个原因，所述 implicitWidth 每个对勾标记的应大于或等于每个次要对勾标记的。如果您需要次要刻度线的宽度大于主要刻度线的宽度，请在minorTickmark组件的子项中设置较大的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The widget accepts input method input.
trans-unit.target: 小部件接受输入法输入。

trans-unit.source: The widget box contains objects in a number of different categories, all of which can be placed on the form as required. The only objects that require a little more preparation are the Container widgets. These are described in further detail in the Using Containers in Qt Designer chapter.
trans-unit.target: 小部件框包含许多不同类别的对象，所有类别都可以根据需要放置在表单上。容器控件是唯一需要更多准备的对象。这些在Qt Designer中的“使用容器”一章中有更详细的描述。

trans-unit.source: The widget box contains objects in a number of different categories, all of which can be placed on the form as required. The only objects that require a little more preparation are the Container widgets. These are described in further detail in the Using Containers in Qt Designer chapter.
trans-unit.target: 小部件框包含许多不同类别的对象，所有类别都可以根据需要放置在表单上。容器控件是唯一需要更多准备的对象。这些在Qt Designer中的“ 使用容器”一章中有更详细的描述。

trans-unit.source: The widget box provides a selection of standard Qt widgets, layouts, and other objects that can be used to create user interfaces on forms. Each of the categories in the widget box contain widgets with similar uses or related features.
trans-unit.target: 小组件框提供了标准Qt小组件、布局和其他对象的选择,这些对象可用于在表单上创建用户界面。小组件框中的每个类别都包含了具有类似用途或相关功能的小组件。

trans-unit.source: The widget box provides common widgets and layouts that are used to design components. These are grouped into categories that reflect their uses or features.
trans-unit.target: 小部件框提供了用于设计组件的常用小部件和布局。这些部件和布局被归入反映其用途或特征的类别。

trans-unit.source: The widget can grow beyond its size hint if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 如有必要,小部件可以成长到超过其大小的提示。

trans-unit.source: The widget can shrink below its size hint if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 如有必要,小组件可以缩小到其尺寸提示以下。

trans-unit.source: The widget cannot be resized to a larger size than the maximum widget size.
trans-unit.target: 小组件不能调整到比最大小组件尺寸更大的尺寸。

trans-unit.source: The widget cannot be resized to a smaller size than the minimum widget size. The widget's size is forced to the minimum size if the current size is smaller.
trans-unit.target: 无法将小组件调整为比最小小组件尺寸更小的尺寸。如果当前尺寸较小,小组件的尺寸会被强制调整为最小尺寸。

trans-unit.source: The widget features a context menu that is tailored to the element at hand, and includes actions useful in a browser. For a custom context menu, or for embedding actions in a menu or toolbar, the individual actions are available via pageAction(). The web view maintains the state of the returned actions, but allows modification of action properties such as text or icon. The action semantics can also be triggered directly through triggerPageAction().
trans-unit.target: 该小部件具有适合于手边元素的上下文菜单，并包括在浏览器中有用的动作。对于自定义上下文菜单，或将动作嵌入菜单或工具栏中，可通过pageAction（）使用单个动作。Web视图维护返回的动作的状态，但允许修改动作属性，例如text或icon。动作语义也可以通过triggerPageAction（）直接触发。

trans-unit.source: The widget flags
trans-unit.target: 小组件标志

trans-unit.source: The widget flags argument,
trans-unit.target: 小组件标志参数。

trans-unit.source: The widget independent classes of the Undo/Redo framework have been moved into the QtGui module.
trans-unit.target: Undo / Redo框架的独立于小部件的类已移至QtGui模块中。

trans-unit.source: The widget is a window (i.e top level widget)
trans-unit.target: 小部件是一个窗口(即顶层小部件)。

trans-unit.source: The widget is already visible by default; you do not have to call show() to display the widget.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，该小部件已经可见。您不必调用show（）即可显示小部件。

trans-unit.source: The widget is displayed to the left of the text when using layout direction Qt::LeftToRight or to the right when using Qt::RightToLeft, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 使用布局方向 Qt::LeftToRight 时，小部件显示在文本的左侧；使用 Qt::RightToLeft ，小部件显示在文本的右侧。

trans-unit.source: The widget is displayed to the right of the text when using layout direction Qt::LeftToRight or to the left when using Qt::RightToLeft, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 使用布局方向 Qt::LeftToRight 时，小部件显示在文本的右侧；使用 Qt::RightToLeft ，小部件显示在文本的左侧。

trans-unit.source: The widget is initialized with the current month and year, and the currently selected date is today.
trans-unit.target: 小组件以当前月份和年份初始化,当前选择的日期为今天。

trans-unit.source: The widget is initialized with the current month and year, but QCalendarWidget provides several public slots to change the year and month that is shown.
trans-unit.target: 该小部件已使用当前的月份和年份进行了初始化，但是QCalendarWidget提供了多个公共插槽以更改显示的年份和月份。

trans-unit.source: The widget is initialized with the current month and year, but QCalendarWidget provides several public slots to change the year and month that is shown.
trans-unit.target: 小组件以当前的月份和年份进行初始化,但QCalendarWidget提供了几个公共插槽来改变显示的年份和月份。

trans-unit.source: The widget is located to the far left of the first permanent widget (see addPermanentWidget()) and may be obscured by temporary messages.
trans-unit.target: 该小部件位于第一个永久性小部件的最左侧（请参阅addPermanentWidget（）），并且可能会被临时消息遮盖。

trans-unit.source: The widget is not constrained.
trans-unit.target: 小组件不受约束。

trans-unit.source: The widget is passed as the last argument in case the style needs it to perform special effects (such as animated default buttons on macOS), but it isn't mandatory.
trans-unit.target: 如果样式需要其执行特殊效果（例如macOS上的动画默认按钮），则将其作为最后一个参数传递，但这不是强制性的。

trans-unit.source: The widget is passed as the last argument in case the style needs it to perform special effects (such as animated default buttons on macOS), but it isn't mandatory.
trans-unit.target: 小部件作为最后一个参数被传递,以防样式需要它来执行特殊效果(例如macOS上的动画默认按钮),但这不是强制性的。

trans-unit.source: The widget is polished.
trans-unit.target: 小部件是抛光的。

trans-unit.source: The widget is reparented away from the QMenu to the native menu view. If you show the menu in some other place (e.g. as a popup menu), the widget will not be there.
trans-unit.target: 小部件将从QMenu移到本地菜单视图。如果您在其他地方显示菜单（例如，作为弹出菜单），则小部件将不存在。

trans-unit.source: The widget is the atom of the user interface: it receives mouse, keyboard and other events from the window system, and paints a representation of itself on the screen. Every widget is rectangular, and they are sorted in a Z-order. A widget is clipped by its parent and by the widgets in front of it.
trans-unit.target: 小部件是用户界面的原子:它从窗口系统接收鼠标、键盘和其他事件,并在屏幕上画出自己的表现。每一个小组件都是矩形的,它们按Z字顺序排列。一个小部件被它的父部件和它前面的小部件剪断。

trans-unit.source: The widget parent has changed.

trans-unit.source: The widget parent is about to change.

trans-unit.source: The widget should accept the event if it has "What's This?" help (QHelpEvent).
trans-unit.target: 如果窗口小部件具有“这是什么？”，则应接受该事件。帮助（QHelpEvent）。

trans-unit.source: The widget should be polished.
trans-unit.target: 小部件应该是抛光的。

trans-unit.source: The widget should be queued to be repainted at a later time.
trans-unit.target: 小组件应排队,以便在以后的时间重新绘制。

trans-unit.source: The widget should be repainted.
trans-unit.target: 小部件应该重新涂抹。

trans-unit.source: The widget should examine the list of attributes to apply to the preedit string. It has to understand at least the TextFormat and Cursor attributes and render them as specified.
trans-unit.target: 小部件应检查要应用于预编辑字符串的属性列表。它必须至少了解TextFormat和Cursor属性并按照指定的方式呈现它们。

trans-unit.source: The widget should get as much space as possible.
trans-unit.target: 小部件应该获得尽可能多的空间。

trans-unit.source: The widget should reveal "What's This?" help (QHelpEvent).
trans-unit.target: 小部件应显示“这是什么？” 帮助（QHelpEvent）。

trans-unit.source: The widget will be erased and receive a paint event immediately after processing the resize event. No drawing need be (or should be) done inside this handler.
trans-unit.target: 小组件将被擦除,并在处理完resize事件后立即接收一个paint事件。在该处理程序中不需要(或应该)进行任何绘制。

trans-unit.source: The widget will get an event of type QEvent::LayoutRequest when the layout needs to be recalculated. Reimplement QWidget::event() to handle QEvent::LayoutRequest events.
trans-unit.target: 当需要重新计算布局时，窗口小部件将获得QEvent :: LayoutRequest类型的事件。重新实现QWidget :: event（）以处理QEvent :: LayoutRequest事件。

trans-unit.source: The widget's screenGeometry() function provides information about the geometry of the available screens with. The number of screens available is returned by screenCount, and the screenCountChanged() signal is emitted when screens are added or removed. The screen number that a particular point or widget is located in is returned by screenNumber().
trans-unit.target: 小部件的screenGeometry（）函数提供有关可用屏幕的几何形状的信息。可用的屏幕数由screenCount返回，并且在添加或删除屏幕时会发出screenCountChanged（）信号。画面号的特定点或窗口小部件位于被返回screenNumber（）。

trans-unit.source: The widget's layout direction determines the order in which the layout manager horizontally arranges subwidgets of this widget. The default value depends on the language and locale of the application, and is typically in the same direction as words are read and written. With Qt::LeftToRight, the layout starts placing subwidgets from the left side of this widget towards the right. Qt::RightToLeft does the opposite - the layout will place widgets starting from the right edge moving towards the left.
trans-unit.target: 小部件的布局方向确定布局管理器水平排列此小部件的子小部件的顺序。默认值取决于应用程序的语言和语言环境，并且通常与读取和写入单词的方向相同。使用Qt :: LeftToRight，布局开始从此小部件的左侧向右侧放置子小部件。Qt :: RightToLeft做相反的事情 -布局将从右边缘开始向左放置小部件。

trans-unit.source: The widgets can be in a number of different states, which are defined by the State enum. Some of the state flags have different meanings depending on the widget, but others are common for all widgets like State_Disabled. It is QStyleOption that sets the common states with QStyleOption::initFrom(); the rest of the states are set by the individual widgets.
trans-unit.target: 这些小部件可以处于多个不同的状态，这些状态由State枚举定义。某些状态标志根据窗口小部件的含义不同，但是其他状态标志对于所有窗口小部件（例如 State_Disabled )都是通用的。这是QStyleOption是设置与常见的状态QStyleOption :: initFrom（）; 其余状态由各个小部件设置。

trans-unit.source: The widgets examples show how some of the widgets available in Qt might appear when configured to use the a particular style. Each style is only available on the respective platfom, and provides native look and feel by integrating to the platform theme. Thus, the final appearance varies depending on the active theme.
trans-unit.target: 小部件的例子展示了Qt中一些可用的小部件在配置为使用特定风格时的表现。每种风格只在各自的平台上可用,并通过集成到平台主题中提供本地的外观和感觉。因此,最终的外观会根据活动主题的不同而有所不同。

The values are fractions of the volume thickness in the same dimension. The values cannot be negative.

trans-unit.target: 根据其内容,该行自然占据的宽度,不考虑对以下内容的任何修改

The values are fractions of the volume thickness in the same dimension. The values cannot be negative.

trans-unit.source: The window
trans-unit.target: 窗口

trans-unit.source: The window (general background) color of the current color group.
trans-unit.target: 当前颜色组的窗口(一般背景)颜色。

trans-unit.source: The window attached to this style.
trans-unit.target: 这种风格所附的窗口。

trans-unit.source: The window can be in a combination of several states. For example, if the window is both minimized and maximized, the window will appear minimized, but clicking on the task bar entry will restore it to the maximized state.
trans-unit.target: 窗口可以处于几种状态的组合。例如,如果窗口同时处于最小化和最大化状态,则窗口将显示为最小化状态,但单击任务栏条目将其恢复到最大化状态。

trans-unit.source: The window container has a number of known limitations:
trans-unit.target: 窗口容器有一些已知的限制。

trans-unit.source: The window container is attached as a native child window to the toplevel window it is a child of. When a window container is used as a child of a QAbstractScrollArea or QMdiArea, it will create a native window for every widget in its parent chain to allow for proper stacking and clipping in this use case. Creating a native window for the window container also allows for proper stacking and clipping. This must be done before showing the window container. Applications with many native child windows may suffer from performance issues.
trans-unit.target: 窗口容器作为本机子窗口附加到其子级的顶层窗口。当窗口容器用作QAbstractScrollArea或QMdiArea的子级时，它将为其父链中的每个小部件创建一个本机窗口，以便在此用例中进行适当的堆叠和剪切。为窗口容器创建本机窗口还可以进行正确的堆栈和剪切。必须在显示窗口容器之前完成此操作。具有许多本机子窗口的应用程序可能会遇到性能问题。

trans-unit.source: The window container is created as a child of
trans-unit.target: 窗口容器是作为

trans-unit.source: The window fills the entire screen without any frame around it.
trans-unit.target: 窗口填满了整个屏幕,周围没有任何框架。

trans-unit.source: The window flags control the window's appearance in the windowing system, whether it's a dialog, popup, or a regular window, and whether it should have a title bar, etc.
trans-unit.target: 窗口标志控制窗口在窗口系统中的外观,是对话框、弹出窗口还是普通窗口,以及是否应该有标题栏等。

trans-unit.source: The window flags of the window.
trans-unit.target: 窗口的窗口标志。

trans-unit.source: The window for which this window is a transient pop-up.
trans-unit.target: 本窗口为瞬时弹出的窗口。

trans-unit.source: The window geometry the popup received in the configure event. Relative to the upper left corner of the parent surface.
trans-unit.target: 配置事件中弹出窗口接收到的窗口几何体。相对于父表面的左上角。

trans-unit.source: The window has no state set (in normal state).
trans-unit.target: 窗口没有设置状态(正常状态)。

trans-unit.source: The window icon might be used by the windowing system for example to decorate the window, and/or in the task switcher.
trans-unit.target: 窗口图标可能被窗口系统用来装饰窗口,和/或在任务切换器中使用。

trans-unit.source: The window identifier type depends on the underlying window system, see qwindowdefs.h for the actual definition. If there is no widget with this identifier, nullptr is returned.
trans-unit.target: 窗口标识符的类型取决于基础窗口系统，有关实际定义，请参见 qwindowdefs.h 。如果没有带有此标识符的窗口小部件，则返回 nullptr 。

trans-unit.source: The window is activated according to the default behavior of the Windows operating system. This means the window will not be activated in some circumstances (most notably when the calling process is not the active process); only the taskbar entry will be flashed.
trans-unit.target: 窗口会根据Windows操作系统的默认行为被激活,这意味着在某些情况下(最明显的是当调用进程不是活动进程时),窗口不会被激活;只有任务栏条目会被闪现。这意味着在某些情况下,窗口不会被激活(最主要的是当调用进程不是活动进程时);只有任务栏条目会被闪现。

trans-unit.source: The window is always activated, even when the calling process is not the active process.
trans-unit.target: 即使调用进程不是活动进程,该窗口也总是被激活。

trans-unit.source: The window is blocked by a modal dialog.
trans-unit.target: 窗口被模态对话框挡住了。

trans-unit.source: The window is maximized with a frame around it.
trans-unit.target: 窗口最大化,周围有一个框架。

trans-unit.source: The window is minimized (i.e. iconified).
trans-unit.target: 窗口被最小化(即图标化)。

trans-unit.source: The window is modal to a single window hierarchy and blocks input to its parent window, all grandparent windows, and all siblings of its parent and grandparent windows.
trans-unit.target: 窗口对单一窗口层次结构是模态的,并阻止输入到它的父窗口,所有的祖父母窗口,以及它的父窗口和祖父母窗口的所有兄弟姐妹。

trans-unit.source: The window is modal to the application and blocks input to all windows.
trans-unit.target: 该窗口对应用程序来说是模态的,并阻止所有窗口的输入。

trans-unit.source: The window is modal to the entire scene and blocks input to all panels.
trans-unit.target: 该窗口对整个场景是模态化的,并阻止所有面板的输入。

trans-unit.source: The window is needed because the its pixel format will be queried. When the adoption is successful, QOpenGLContext::format() will return a QSurfaceFormat describing this pixel format.
trans-unit.target: 需要该窗口，因为将查询其像素格式。成功采用后，QOpenGLContext :: format（）将返回描述此像素格式的QSurfaceFormat。

trans-unit.source: The window is not modal and does not block input to other windows.
trans-unit.target: 窗口不是模态的,也不会阻止其他窗口的输入。

trans-unit.source: The window is not shown until setVisible(true), show(), or similar is called.
trans-unit.target: 在调用setVisible（true），show（）或类似方法之前，不会显示该窗口。

trans-unit.source: The window is not visible in any way, however it may remember a latent visibility which can be restored by setting AutomaticVisibility.
trans-unit.target: 窗口以任何方式都不可见,但它可能会记住一个潜在的可见性,可以通过设置自动可见性来恢复。

trans-unit.source: The window is reduced to an entry or icon on the task bar, dock, task list or desktop, depending on how the windowing system handles minimized windows.
trans-unit.target: 窗口被缩减为任务栏、码头、任务列表或桌面上的条目或图标,这取决于窗口系统如何处理最小化窗口。

trans-unit.source: The window is the active window, i.e. it has keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 该窗口是活动窗口,即它有键盘焦点。

trans-unit.source: The window is unblocked after a modal dialog exited.
trans-unit.target: 模态对话框退出后,窗口被解封。

trans-unit.source: The window manager may or may not choose to display any areas of the window not included in the mask, thus it is the application's responsibility to clear to transparent the areas that are not part of the mask.
trans-unit.target: 窗口管理器可能会也可能不会选择显示不包括在遮罩中的任何窗口区域,因此,应用程序有责任将不属于遮罩的区域清除为透明。

trans-unit.source: The window occupies one entire screen, and the titlebar is still visible. On most windowing systems this is the state achieved by clicking the maximize button on the toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 窗口占据了整个屏幕,标题栏仍然可见。在大多数窗口系统中,这是通过点击工具栏上的最大化按钮实现的状态。

trans-unit.source: The window occupies one entire screen, is not resizable, and there is no titlebar. On some platforms which do not support showing multiple simultaneous windows, this can be the usual visibility when the window is not hidden.
trans-unit.target: 窗口占据了整个屏幕,不可调整大小,也没有标题栏。在一些不支持同时显示多个窗口的平台上,当窗口不隐藏时,这可能是通常的可见性。

trans-unit.source: The window occupies part of the screen, but not necessarily the entire screen. This state will occur only on windowing systems which support showing multiple windows simultaneously. In this state it is possible for the user to move and resize the window manually, if WindowFlags permit it and if it is supported by the windowing system.
trans-unit.target: 窗口占据了屏幕的一部分,但不一定是整个屏幕。只有在支持同时显示多个窗口的窗口系统中才会出现这种状态。在这种状态下,如果WindowFlags允许并且窗口系统支持的话,用户可以手动移动和调整窗口的大小。

trans-unit.source: The window rectangle is part of the view transformation. The window specifies the logical coordinate system. Its sister, the viewport(), specifies the device coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: 窗口矩形是视图转换的一部分。该窗口指定逻辑坐标系。它的姐妹视口（）指定设备坐标系。

trans-unit.source: The window state before a window state change
trans-unit.target: 窗口状态改变前的窗口状态

trans-unit.source: The window system identifer for this native widget has changed.
trans-unit.target: 此本机小工具的窗口系统识别码已更改。

trans-unit.source: The window system identifier (WId) can be retrieved using the QWidget::winId() function. The rationale for using a window identifier and not a QWidget, is to enable grabbing of windows that are not part of the application, window system frames, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用QWidget :: winId（）函数来检索窗口系统标识符（ WId ）。使用窗口标识符而不是QWidget的基本原理是能够捕获不属于应用程序的窗口，窗口系统框架等。

trans-unit.source: The window system identifier (WId) can be retrieved using the QWidget::winId() function. The rationale for using a window identifier and not a QWidget, is to enable grabbing of windows that are not part of the application, window system frames, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用QWidget :: winId（）函数来检索窗口系统标识符（ WId ）。使用窗口标识符而不是QWidget的基本原理是能够捕获不属于应用程序的窗口，窗口系统框架等。

trans-unit.source: The window system made this window either active or inactive.
trans-unit.target: 窗口系统让这个窗口要么主动,要么不主动。

trans-unit.target: 窗口的所有权

trans-unit.source: The window text (general foreground) color of the current color group.

trans-unit.source: The window title has changed.
trans-unit.target: 窗口标题已经改变。

trans-unit.source: The window title is set to
trans-unit.target: 窗口标题设置为

trans-unit.source: The window title might appear in the title area of the window decorations, depending on the windowing system and the window flags. It might also be used by the windowing system to identify the window in other contexts, such as in the task switcher.
trans-unit.target: 窗口标题可能会出现在窗口装饰的标题区域,这取决于窗口系统和窗口标志。窗口系统还可能在其他情况下,如在任务切换器中,用它来识别窗口。

trans-unit.source: The window title must contain a "[*]" placeholder, which indicates where the '*' should appear. Normally, it should appear right after the file name (e.g., "document1.txt[*] - Text Editor"). If the window isn't modified, the placeholder is simply removed.
trans-unit.target: 窗口标题必须包含一个"[*]"占位符,该占位符指示'*'应该出现在哪里。通常,它应该出现在文件名之后(例如,"document1.txt[*]-文本编辑器")。如果窗口没有被修改,占位符就会被删除。

trans-unit.source: The window will be embedded inside the parent window, its coordinates relative to the parent.
trans-unit.target: 窗口将嵌入到父窗口内,其坐标相对于父窗口。

trans-unit.source: The window's icon has changed.
trans-unit.target: 窗口的图标发生了变化。

trans-unit.source: The window's title in the windowing system.
trans-unit.target: 窗口系统中窗口的标题。

trans-unit.source: The windowing system might not support size increments.
trans-unit.target: 窗口系统可能不支持尺寸递增。

trans-unit.source: The windowing system might use
trans-unit.target: 窗口系统可以使用

trans-unit.source: The windows are closed in random order, until one window does not accept the close event. The application quits when the last window was successfully closed, unless quitOnLastWindowClosed is set to false. To trigger application termination from e.g. a menu, use QCoreApplication::quit() instead of this function.
trans-unit.target: 窗口以随机顺序关闭，直到一个窗口不接受关闭事件。成功关闭最后一个窗口后，应用程序将退出，除非quitOnLastWindowClosed设置为false。要从菜单中触发应用程序终止，请使用QCoreApplication :: quit（）代替此函数。

trans-unit.source: The windows are closed in random order, until one window does not accept the close event. The application quits when the last window was successfully closed; this can be turned off by setting quitOnLastWindowClosed to false.
trans-unit.target: 窗口以随机顺序关闭，直到一个窗口不接受关闭事件。成功关闭最后一个窗口后，应用程序退出；可以通过将quitOnLastWindowClosed设置为false 来关闭它。

trans-unit.source: The windows are returned in the order in which they are stacked, with the top-most window being last in the list.
trans-unit.target: 窗口按其堆叠顺序返回,最上面的窗口是列表中的最后一个。

trans-unit.source: The windows are returned in the order in which they were activated.
trans-unit.target: 窗口按其被激活的顺序返回。

trans-unit.source: The windows are returned in the order of their creation.
trans-unit.target: 窗口按创建顺序返回。

trans-unit.source: The word ancestor here means a parent widget within the same window.
trans-unit.target: 这里的祖先一词是指同一窗口中的父部件。

trans-unit.source: The word candidate is from the default dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 候选词来自默认字典。

trans-unit.source: The world ID defining which isolated world the script is executed in. Besides these predefined IDs custom IDs can be used, but must be integers between 0 and 256.
trans-unit.target: 定义脚本在哪个隔离世界中执行的世界ID。除了这些预定义的ID外，还可以使用自定义ID，但必须是 0 到 256 之间的整数。

trans-unit.source: The world used by the page's web contents. It can be useful in order to expose custom functionality to web contents in certain scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 页面的网页内容所使用的世界。在某些情况下,它可以很有用地将自定义功能暴露给网页内容。

trans-unit.source: The write channel is implicitly opened when start() is called.
trans-unit.target: 调用start（）时隐式打开写通道。

trans-unit.source: The writer of the media.
trans-unit.target: 媒体的作者。

trans-unit.target: 错误的方法是使用基类构造函数。

trans-unit.target: 粒子在其生命初期的x加速度。

trans-unit.target: 变形矢量沿X轴的x分量。ImageParticle可以跨非正方形形状绘制粒子。它将在用x和y变形矢量绘制的平行四边形上绘制纹理矩形。

trans-unit.source: The x-dimension index into the texture data indicating which vertical slice to show. Setting any dimension to negative indicates no slice or slice frame for that dimension is drawn. If all dimensions are negative, no slices or slice frames are drawn and the volume is drawn normally. Defaults to -1.
trans-unit.target: 纹理数据中的x维度索引，指示要显示的垂直切片。将任何尺寸设置为负表示未绘制该尺寸的切片或切片框架。如果所有尺寸均为负，则不会绘制任何切片或切片框架，并且将正常绘制体积。默认为 -1 。

trans-unit.source: The y component of the deformation vector along the Y axis. ImageParticle can draw particles across non-square shapes. It will draw the texture rectangle across the parallelogram drawn with the x and y deformation vectors.

trans-unit.source: Then there is the Rectangle item. In the example this means that the rotation will match the cube's rotation.
trans-unit.target: 然后是矩形项。当将其添加到Node下时，内部会跨越3D和2D世界的边界，但这对应用程序设计者来说仍然是透明的。自动生成一个不可见的 content item ，从而允许Rectangle引用 parent 并执行锚定。来自节点的3D变换将应用于整个2D子树。在此示例中，这意味着旋转将匹配多维数据集的旋转。

trans-unit.source: There are 3 prerequisites for implementing cross-referencing by alternative identifier. The first is that the origin manager must provide the x_provider attribute with the value being the name of the manager's QGeoServiceProvider. The attribute label should be kept empty, indicating the attribute should not be displayed to users.
trans-unit.target: 通过替代标识符实现交叉引用存在3个先决条件。首先是源管理器必须向x_provider属性提供值，该值是管理器的QGeoServiceProvider的名称。属性标签应保留为空，指示不应向用户显示该属性。

trans-unit.source: There are a number of tasks that are often performed by developers when editing and processing text documents using Qt. These include the use of display widgets such as QTextBrowser and QTextEdit, creation of documents with QTextDocument, editing using a QTextCursor, and exporting the document structure. This document outlines some of the more common ways of using the rich text classes to perform these tasks, showing convenient patterns that can be reused in your own applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用Qt编辑和处理文本文档时，开发人员经常执行许多任务。这些方法包括使用显示部件如QTextBrowser和的QTextEdit，创建与文档另外，QTextDocument，使用编辑QTextCursor，和导出文档结构。本文档概述了使用富文本类执行这些任务的一些更常见的方法，并显示了可以在您自己的应用程序中重用的便捷模式。

trans-unit.source: There are cases however, when allowing the 2D content write to the depth buffer is not ideal. In this case, having the depth buffer filled by 2D content can cause unexpected results. This is because the way the 2D scene graph renderer generates and handles depth values is not necessarily compatible with how a 3D scene works. trans-unit.source: There are currently no other defined CBOR simple types. QCborValue supports them simply by their number with API like isSimpleType() and toSimpleType(), available for compatibility with future specifications before the Qt API can be updated. Their use before such a specification is discouraged, as other CBOR implementations may not support them fully.
trans-unit.target: 当前没有其他定义的CBOR简单类型。QCborValue仅通过它们的编号（例如isSimpleType（）和toSimpleType（））支持它们，从而可以与Qt API进行更新之前的将来规范兼容。不鼓励在这样的规范之前使用它们，因为其他CBOR实现可能无法完全支持它们。

trans-unit.source: There are different date formats with different understandings of negative years. Common human language does not have a year 0. The year after 1BC is 1AD. This understanding is reflected when printing or parsing dates in one of the formats not standardized by ECMAScript. That is: toString(), toLocaleString(), toUTCString() and friends. ECMAScript does standardize one format: ISO 8601. This is what you get when you call toISOString(). This format does include a year 0, which is 1BC in other formats. Thus you get different years when printing negative dates with toISOString() and toString().
trans-unit.target: 不同的日期格式对负数年有不同的理解。通用人类语言没有年份0。1BC之后的年份是1AD。当以ECMAScript未标准化的格式之一打印或解析日期时，会反映出这种理解。即：toString（），toLocaleString（），toUTCString（）和朋友。ECMAScript确实标准化了一种格式：ISO8601。这是在调用toISOString（）时所得到的。此格式确实包含年份0，其他格式为1BC。因此，使用toISOString（）和toString（）打印否定日期时，会得到不同的年份。

trans-unit.source: There are four dock widget areas as given by the Qt::DockWidgetArea enum: left, right, top, and bottom. You can specify which dock widget area that should occupy the corners where the areas overlap with setCorner(). By default each area can only contain one row (vertical or horizontal) of dock widgets, but if you enable nesting with setDockNestingEnabled(), dock widgets can be added in either direction.
trans-unit.target: Qt :: DockWidgetArea枚举给出了四个停靠小部件区域：左，右，上和下。您可以使用 setCorner() 指定哪个停靠窗口小部件区域应占据该区域重叠的角。默认情况下，每个区域只能包含一行（垂直或水平）停靠小部件，但是如果使用 setDockNestingEnabled() 启用嵌套，则可以在任一方向添加停靠小部件。

trans-unit.source: There are four kinds of action items: separators, actions that show a submenu, widgets, and actions that perform an action. Separators are inserted with addSeparator(), submenus with addMenu(), and all other items are considered action items.
trans-unit.target: 操作项目有四种：分隔符，显示子菜单的操作，小部件和执行操作的操作。用addSeparator（）插入分隔符，用addMenu（）插入子菜单，所有其他项都被视为操作项。

trans-unit.source: There are functions to convert between QImage and QPixmap. Typically, the QImage class is used to load an image file, optionally manipulating the image data, before the QImage object is converted into a QPixmap to be shown on screen. Alternatively, if no manipulation is desired, the image file can be loaded directly into a QPixmap.
trans-unit.target: 有一些函数可以在QImage和QPixmap之间进行转换。通常，在将QImage对象转换为要在屏幕上显示的QPixmap之前，使用QImage类加载图像文件，并选择处理图像数据。或者，如果不需要任何操作，则可以将图像文件直接加载到QPixmap中。

trans-unit.target: 有用于绘制像素图/图像的函数，即drawPixmap（），drawImage（）和drawTiledPixmap（）。既drawPixmap（）和的drawImage（）产生相同的结果，不同之处在于drawPixmap（）是屏幕上的速度，同时的drawImage（）可以是在快QPrinter来或其他设备。

trans-unit.source: There are further restrictions for OpenGL-based windows. As of Qt 5.3, eglfs supports a single, fullscreen GL window (for example, an OpenGL-based QWindow, a QQuickView or a QGLWidget). Opening additional OpenGL windows or mixing such windows with QWidget-based content is not supported and will terminate the application with an error message.
trans-unit.target: 基于OpenGL的窗口还有其他限制。从Qt 5.3开始，eglfs支持单个全屏GL窗口（例如，基于OpenGL的QWindow，QQuickView或QGLWidget）。不支持打开其他OpenGL窗口或将此类窗口与基于QWidget的内容混合使用，并且会终止该应用程序并显示错误消息。

trans-unit.source: There are further restrictions for OpenGL-based windows. EGLFS supports a single single fullscreen GL window (as of Qt 5.3), like OpenGL-based QWindow, a QQuickView, or a QOpenGLWidget. Opening additional OpenGL windows or mixing such windows with QWidget-based content isn't supported; Qt terminates the application with an error message.
trans-unit.target: 基于OpenGL的窗口还有其他限制。EGLFS支持单个单一的全屏GL窗口（从Qt 5.3开始），例如基于OpenGL的QWindow，QQuickView或QOpenGLWidget。不支持打开其他OpenGL窗口或将此类窗口与基于QWidget的内容混合使用；Qt使用错误消息终止应用程序。

trans-unit.source: There are further restrictions for OpenGL-based windows. EGLFS supports a single single fullscreen GL window (as of Qt 5.3), like OpenGL-based QWindow, a QQuickView, or a QOpenGLWidget. Opening additional OpenGL windows or mixing such windows with QWidget-based content isn't supported; Qt terminates the application with an error message.
trans-unit.target: 基于OpenGL的窗口还有其他限制。EGLFS支持单个单一的全屏GL窗口（从Qt 5.3开始），例如基于OpenGL的QWindow，QQuickView或QOpenGLWidget。不支持打开其他OpenGL窗口或将此类窗口与基于QWidget的内容混合使用；Qt使用错误消息终止应用程序。

trans-unit.source: There are many ways to construct a QSslCertificate. The most common way is to call QSslSocket::peerCertificate(), which returns a QSslCertificate object, or QSslSocket::peerCertificateChain(), which returns a list of them. You can also load certificates from a DER (binary) or PEM (Base64) encoded bundle, typically stored as one or more local files, or in a Qt Resource.
trans-unit.target: 有很多方法可以构造QSslCertificate。最常用的方法是调用QSslSocket :: peerCertificate（），它返回一个QSslCertificate对象，或QSslSocket :: peerCertificateChain（），它返回它们的列表。您还可以从DER（二进制）或PEM（Base64）编码的捆绑包（通常存储为一个或多个本地文件）或Qt资源中加载证书。

You can also load certificates from a DER (binary) or PEM (Base64) encoded bundle, typically stored as one or more local files, or in a Qt Resource.

trans-unit.source: There are no source or binary compatibility guarantees for the QPA classes, meaning that a platform plugin is only guaranteed to work with the Qt version it was developed against. API changes will however only be made in minor releases. (5.1, 5.2, and so on.)

trans-unit.source: There are several functions that operate on the font: ascent(), descent(), height(), leading() and lineSpacing() return the basic size properties of the font. trans-unit.source: There are several related non-members: QRgb is a typdef for an unsigned int representing the RGB value triplet (r, g, b). Note that it also can hold a value for the alpha-channel (for more information, see the Alpha-Blended Drawing section). The qRed(), qBlue() and qGreen() functions return the respective component of the given QRgb value, while the qRgb() and qRgba() functions create and return the QRgb triplet based on the given component values. Finally, the qAlpha() function returns the alpha component of the provided QRgb, and the qGray() function calculates and return a gray value based on the given value.
trans-unit.target: 有几个相关的非成员：QRgb是表示RGB值三元组（r，g，b）的无符号int的typdef。请注意，它也可以保存Alpha通道的值（有关更多信息，请参见Alpha混合图部分）。所述qRed（），qBlue（）和qGreen（）函数返回给定的各组分QRgb值，而qRgb（）和qRgba（）函数创建并返回QRgb三重基于给定的元件值。最后，qAlpha（）函数返回提供的QRgb的alpha分量和qGray（）函数根据给定值计算并返回灰度值。
